template.name: Windows Update Not Installed_By Client (csv)
template.template_variables:
data_sources:
  allFieldsWindowsUpdates:
    filter:
      agent__site__client__id: '{{client.id}}'
    model: winupdate
    only:
    - id
    - agent__hostname
    - title
    - installed
    - description
    - severity
    - categories
    - category_ids
    - kb_article_ids
